text: St. Mark's Episcopal Church is a parish of the Episcopal Church in Cocoa, Brevard County, Florida, in the Episcopal Diocese of Central Florida. It is noted for its historic church building located at 4 Church Street, built circa 1886. A parochial school, St. Mark's Episcopal Academy, was begun by the church in 1956. ==References== ==External links== *St. Mark's Episcopal Church and Academy (official website) Category:Churches completed in 1886 Category:19th-century Episcopal church buildings Category:Churches in Brevard County, Florida Category:Cocoa, Florida Category:Episcopal church buildings in Florida Category:1878 establishments in Florida Category:Christian organizations established in 1878
title: St. Mark's Episcopal Church (Cocoa, Florida)
